title: Ticket #5005: condor_q V3 protocol should support direct fetch of Jobs by id.
description: act_on_jobs (used by condor_rm, etc) has an optimization that allows for direct lookup of jobs by id instead of walking the job queue using a constraint to find the requested jobs. The new V3 protocol should support this also, and condor_q should make use of the optimization.
creator: johnkn
